1201090.name: Abstraction
1201090.description:
Abstraction is an old school survival horror game.

In Abstraction you play as Violet, a young woman who wakes up in a familiar yet disturbing world. The party, the music, the lights... it's all blurry, and only one thing is clear: something terrible happened last night. Gruesome creatures lurk around the corner, and Vi must survive her personal hell in a place that often does not seem to make sense.

  • Old school survival horror, where resources are scarce and dangers are plenty

  • Semi-fixed camera angles

  • Retro graphics

  • Puzzles and riddles

  • Emphasis on story
1201090.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
